levelList.name: Garden of Thorns
levelList.desc:
[BeforeAttack] At 3+ highest Reson., Atk Weight +1
[WhenUse] Apply 1 '(Corresponding Sin Affinity) Damage Up' and '1 (Corresponding Sin Affinity) Power Up' to (1 + # of highest Reson.) allies.
- At 4+ Corresponding Reson., apply 1 additional '(Corresponding Sin Affinity) Damage Up'

coindescs.desc:
[EndSkill] Heal 1 ally with the lowest HP percentage for 15% HP of their max HP
- Heal (highest # of Reson. - 2) more allies (max 3)

levelList.name: Garden of Thorns
levelList.desc:
[BeforeAttack] Gain (# of highest Reson. - 2) Atk Weight (Max 2)
[WhenUse] Apply 1 '(Corresponding Sin Affinity) Damage Up' and '1 (Corresponding Sin Affinity) Power Up' to (2 + # of highest Reson.) allies.
- At 4+ Corresponding Reson., apply 1 additional '(Corresponding Sin Affinity) Damage Up'
- At 5+ Corresponding Reson., apply 1 additional '(Corresponding Sin Affinity) Power Up'

coindescs.desc:
[EndSkill] Heal 2 allies with the lowest HP percentages for 18% HP of their max HP
- Heal (highest # of Reson. - 2) more allies (max 3)

levelList.name: Garden of Thorns
levelList.desc:
[BeforeAttack] Gain (# of highest Reson. - 2) Atk Weight (Max 3)
[WhenUse] Apply 1 '(Corresponding Sin Affinity) Damage Up' and '1 (Corresponding Sin Affinity) Power Up' to (4 + # of highest Reson.) allies.
- At 4+ Corresponding Reson., apply 1 additional '(Corresponding Sin Affinity) Damage Up'
- At 5+ Corresponding Reson., apply 1 additional '(Corresponding Sin Affinity) Power Up'
- At 6+ Corresponding A-Reson., apply the above effects next turn as well

coindescs.desc:
[EndSkill] Heal 4 allies with the lowest HP percentages for 22% HP of their max HP
- Heal (highest # of Reson. - 2) more allies (max 3)

levelList.name: Garden of Thorns
levelList.desc:
[CantIdentify]
Targets Randomly
[BeforeAttack] At 3+ highest Reson., Atk Weight +1

coindescs.desc:
[OnSucceedAttack] Inflict 1 'Fragility' and 1 'Power Down' for the Sin Affinity with the highest Reson. count
- At 4+ Corresponding Reson., inflict 1 additional '(Corresponding Sin Affinity) Fragility'

levelList.desc:

coindescs.desc:
[OnSucceedAttack] Inflict 1 'Fragility' and 1 'Power Down' for the Sin Affinity with the highest Resonance count

- At 5+ Corresponding Reson., inflict 1 additional '(Corresponding Sin Affinity) Power Down'

coindescs.desc:

- At 4+ Corresponding Reson., inflict 1 additional '(Corresponding Sin Affinity) Fragility'
- At 5+ Corresponding Reson., inflict 1 additional '(Corresponding Sin Affinity) Power Down'

levelList.name: Bygone Days
levelList.desc:
[EndSkill] Heal 10 SP to self and 2 other allies with the least SP
- If the target survives this attack, consume 5 [Sinking] Count on target, then heal additional SP(to self & affected allies) equal to [Sinking] Potency on target (Max SP heal: 20)
- If the target is defeated, inflict 3 [Sinking] on 2 random enemies (For Focused Encounters, random Parts)

levelList.name: Bygone Days
levelList.desc:
[EndSkill] Heal <style="highlight">12</style> SP to self and 2 other allies with the least SP
- If the target survives this attack, consume 5 [Sinking] Count on target, then heal additional SP(to self & affected allies) equal to [Sinking] Potency on target (Max SP heal: 20)
- If the target is defeated, inflict 3 [Sinking] and <style="highlight">1 [Curse]</style> on 2 random enemies (For Focused Encounters, random Parts)

levelList.name: Bygone Days
levelList.desc:
[EndSkill] Heal <style="highlight">15</style> SP to self and 2 other allies with the least SP
- If the target survives this attack, consume <style="highlight">3</style> [Sinking] Count on target, then heal additional SP(to self & affected allies) equal to [Sinking] Potency on target (Max SP heal: 20)
- If the target is defeated, inflict 3 [Sinking] and 1 [Curse] on <style="highlight">3</style> random enemies (For Focused Encounters, random Parts)

coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttack] Inflict 2 [AzureTakeDamageUp]. At 3+ Gloom Reson., inflict 1 additional [AzureTakeDamageUp]
[OnSucceedAttack] Inflict 2 [AzureTakeDamageUp]. Inflict 1 additional [AzureTakeDamageUp] for every 3 Gloom Reson. (max 2)

levelList.name: Bygone Days
levelList.desc:

If the target has [Curse], deal +50% more damage

coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttack] Inflict 2 [AzureTakeDamageUp]. Inflict 1 additional [AzureTakeDamageUp] for every 2 Gloom Reson. (max 2)
